name: Semaglutide
description: Semaglutide is a GLP-1 receptor agonist that helps regulate appetite and blood sugar levels. It is effective for weight management and type 2 diabetes.

name: Tirzepatide
description: Tirzepatide acts on both GIP and GLP-1 receptors to provide dual-action weight management support, often leading to greater weight loss results.

name: Oral Semaglutide
description: A daily oral tablet alternative to injections, offering similar appetite regulation benefits for those who prefer pills over needles.
